title: Eco-Conscious Smart Home Near the Vistula in Radziwie
description: Modern sustainability meets comfort in this striking, energy-efficient 5-bedroom house in the dynamic Radziwie district of Plock. Designed for forward-thinking living, the property includes underfloor heating, state-of-the-art energy-efficient windows, and an EV charging station in its spacious dual-car garage. Perfect for families and digital nomads alike, it features a dedicated home office space and flowing open-plan living areas spanning approximately 215 sqm. Natural light abounds, emphasizing its eco-modern finishes.
neighborhood_description: Located in Plock’s Radziwie neighborhood, this stylish residence is just steps from the city’s vibrant center and the iconic Vistula river waterfront. Recognized for its technology-minded community, Radziwie offers lively urban energy enhanced by convenient access to highways and public transport connections. Enjoy tech-savvy neighbors, inspiring cafes, and green riverfront spaces ideal for seamless balance between work, networking, and leisure.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for remote work and digital nomads
proximity to city cafes and workspaces
target_buyer: Digital nomads, tech professionals, or modern families seeking a green, future-ready home with flexible work-and-life integration.
market_positioning: Outstanding option for eco-conscious buyers and remote professionals who value connectivity, modern comfort, and proximity to both natural and urban amenities. This property distinguishes itself within the Radziwie market for its smart home features and dedicated work-from-home potential.
